Constructor Detail

LocateHTTPResponse

public LocateHTTPResponse(java.io.OutputStream out,
                          java.lang.String ipAddress,
                          int port)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Creating a new response instance, in order to send server's address to the bunny.
N.B the same server (i.e. the micro server) is used as broadcast and ping server.

Parameters:
out - the output stream used to communicate with the bunny.
ipAddress - the IP address to which ping/broad server is bound.
port - the port to which ping/broad server is bound.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an IO eroor occured while sending response data bytes.
